main.lang_en_a: This is a secretary at Mohammed V University.
main.lang_en_b: This is a student at Mohammed V University.

item.lang_tl: آلو واش يمكن لي نهضر مع رشيد؟
item.hint: The secretary calls on the phone and asks to speak to Rachid.
The student (Rachid) answers the phone and asks who the caller is.

item.lang_tl: جامعة محمد الخامس، عندنا النمرة ديال لكارط ديال الجامعة ديالك۔
item.hint: The secretary says it is Mohammed V University and informs the student (Rachid) that they have his student ID number.

item.lang_tl: مزيان، واش يمكن ليك تعطيها لي فالتليفون؟
item.hint: The student asks if the secretary can give him the number over the phone.

item.lang_tl: آه، النمرة هي 5432278901۔ يمكن ليك تاخد لكارط ديالك غدا۔
item.hint: The secretary gives him the number and informs him that he can pick up his ID card tomorrow. The secretary gives him the number and informs him that he can pick up his ID card tomorrow.The secretary gives him the number and informs him that he can pick up his ID card tomorrow.

main.lang_en_a: This is a customer service representative at an airline.
main.lang_en_b: This is a customer of the airline.

item.lang_tl: صباح الخير مطار محمد الخامس الدار البيضا۔
item.hint: The customer service representative bids the person a good morning then identifies the airport.

item.lang_tl: صباح الخير، بغيت نتأكد من واحد النمرة ديال واحد۔ الرحلة الله يخليك۔
item.hint: The customer says good morning to the person and asks to confirm a flight number.
The customer service representative says, Of course.
The customer gives the flight number 5941.

item.lang_tl: معندناش هاد النمرة و لكن عندنا النمرة ديال رحلة خرى واللي هي 1945۔
item.hint: The customer service representative says that they do not have that number, but they have flight number 1945.

item.lang_tl: آه، هادي هي النمرة الصحيحة، شكرا، بسلامة۔
item.hint: The customer says the number given by the service representative was correct then thanks the representative and says bye.

main.lang_en_a: This is a man calling his friend for another person's phone number.
main.lang_tl_a: راجل كيتصل بصاحبو باش يسول على شي نمرة دشي واحد خُر۔

item.hint: Aziz calls Ali on the phone.
Ali greets Aziz and asks him how he is doing.

item.lang_tl: بخير۔ واش عندك النمرة ديال التليفون ديال فاطمة؟
item.hint: Aziz asks if Ali has Fatima's number.
